description:
nova.conf is configured with virt_type=kvm

When running hypervisor-show XXX | grep hypervisor_type

The result is always presented as QEMU

>>> | hypervisor_type           | QEMU

I gather that this is also the same is presented in Horizon on the Hypervisors tab.

More information can be found in this thread

http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-operators/2016-May/010310.html

I think this is visible on each and every version of OpenStack.
title: Wrong Hypervisor is being returned QEMU instead of KVM
